response.original_title: Phineas And Ferb: Vendpocalypse The Musical
response.overview: Doof's greatest fear comes true when vending machines take over and his robot Norm must choose between humans and machines. Candace steps up to help the kids while Perry teams up with Doofenshmirtz to save the citizens of Danville and stop the vending machine apocalypse.
response.title: Phineas And Ferb: Vendpocalypse The Musical
